channel.title: Rs2hd configuration help needed!
channel.description:
Question/Need help with: Can someone explain to me how i can take a rs2hd source and make it either a 317, 474, 508, or other revisions like how they have some rs2hd sources with 474 and some with 562?
Details: I'm not interested in finding a rs2hd source with any of those protocols, but im interested in how to make those protocols work or how to configure the source to allow either a 317, 474, 508, or other revisions able to login the server.
Ex: * make it into a 474 and allow a 474 client * * make it into a 317 and allow a 317 client * * make it into a 525 and allow a 525 client *
---
Please and thanks to whoever can help with this in advance. I accept links to tutorials, explanations, and such. Please no spam/unless posts i really need this information.
